name: OS3 Bash
tagline: This is a repro I use to prepare for my master intake exam. It is usefull to have it on git because I am able to log my progress
body:
# os3
This is a repro I use to prepare for my master intake exam. 
It is usefull to have it on git because I am able to log my progress.

#scripts
## calculator
	#!/bin/bash
	#Auteur: Dhr. ing. B.A. Blaauwgeers
	#Scriptname: Calculator v1
	#Func: Script to add values and return the result.
	echo "Give A to me"
	read A
	echo "and please give me B also"
	read B
	C=$(echo $A + $B | bc) #werkt met INT en FLOAT
	echo 'so the answer to the question A+B=' $C
## pingtest
	#!/bin/bash
	#Auteur: Dhr. ing. B.A. Blaauwgeers
	#Script-Naam: Pingtest v0.2.3
	#Functie: Controleer of de achternaam van de gebruiker is geregistreerd,
 	#in de .nl dns-zone op basis van PING
	
	echo "Please enter your surname?"
	read surname
	echo "We are going to lookup your surname domain with the tld .NL"
	echo "please wait..."
	ping -c 1 -v $surname.nl
	result=$?
	if [ $result -eq 0 ]
	then
		echo "The domain $surname .nl is registered and we are able to ping"
	elif [ $result -eq 1 ]
	then
		echo "The domain $surname .nl is registered but we are unable to ping"
	else echo "We are unable to ping $surname .nl so it might be free"
	fi
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
